author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
E'er upon the peaks of Atlas, calamity did descend,
Morocco's heart in rubble, Marrakesh doth attend,
Earth did quake with Odin's fury, its power to offend,
Six hundred souls to Valhalla, and hundreds more to mend. 

Of the New World a vision, a wanderer's path in sight,
To weave the threads of East and West, ‘neath the falcon's flight,
Thor's hammer pounds the iron lines, to Saudi sands and Israel's light,
Tying knots with sea and rail, Europe beckons bright.

In the kingdom of the dragon, shadows on the throne,
Midst the stagnant waters, seeds of growth are sown.
Inflation's breath, a fleeting ghost, in the market's monotone,
Drakkar sails amidst the storm, its course yet unknown.

feedItems.title: Morocco Earthquake Death Toll Rises to at Least 632
feedItems.description: The magnitude-6.8 quake struck the High Atlas Mountains, less than 50 miles from Marrakesh. More than 300 people were injured.

feedItems.title: U.S.-Backed Transit Corridor Looks to Connect Europe, Mideast, Asia
feedItems.description: The project aims to connect Saudi Arabia, the United Arab Emirates and potentially Israel by freight rail, then use sea transport to reach India and Europe.

feedItems.title: Chinese Inflation Returns in Reprieve for Economy
feedItems.description: Economists say more stimulus is needed to revive sluggish growth.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
Of chips and trade, a tale of power,
In East and West, a hostile hour.
Semiconductors, fraught and rare,
Threaten peace 'twixt here and there.

Co-head of Aligned Alternatives deemed,
Eric Hanno is now esteemed.
In the grand hall of Apollo,
His leadership they choose to follow.

A merchant’s heart, once strong and sound,
Kroger's fortune turns around.
In the realm of poppy's tear,
Their coin is lost, their future unclear.

feedItems.title: How the U.S. Stumbled Into Using Chips as a Weapon Against China
feedItems.description: Export restrictions on semiconductors and other cutting-edge tech have become an important foreign-policy tool, but the long-term consequences could be dangerous for America and the world.

feedItems.title: Apollo appointed Eric Hanno as co-head of Apollo Aligned Alternatives.
feedItems.description: Apollo appointed Eric Hanno as co-head of Apollo Aligned Alternatives.

feedItems.title: Kroger swung to a loss in the latest quarter as it incurred a $1.4 billion charge related to a nationwide opioid settlement. The grocery giant also said it would sell hundreds of stores as it seeks approval for its merger with Albertsons.
feedItems.description: Kroger swung to a loss in the latest quarter as it incurred a $1.4 billion charge related to a nationwide opioid settlement. The grocery giant also said it would sell hundreds of stores as it seeks approval for its merger with Albertsons.

author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
For SpaceX, a bard's lament of a tale so queer,
The FAA lays down its gently veiled spear,
Dozens of steps must they engage,
Ere the Starship graces heaven's wide stage.

I tell a tale of payment's square, a widespread ail,
Where merchants’ pleas fill the evening’s gale,
Credit they cannot claim, as chaos descended,
A business heartache, two days unended.

Of courtly debates that rage afar,
A decree from the realm's highest bar,
Censoring voices in pandemic wake,
The First Amendment, they should not forsake.

feedItems.title: The FAA said SpaceX must take dozens of steps before the company is able to launch one of its Starship rockets again.
feedItems.description: The FAA said SpaceX must take dozens of steps before the company is able to launch one of its Starship rockets again.

feedItems.title: Payments platform Square was hit by widespread outages Thursday and Friday, leaving business customers around the U.S. unable to process credit-card payments.
feedItems.description: Payments platform Square was hit by widespread outages Thursday and Friday, leaving business customers around the U.S. unable to process credit-card payments.

feedItems.title: A federal appeals court ruled the administration's policing of social-media content during the pandemic likely violated the First Amendment.
feedItems.description: A federal appeals court ruled the administration’s policing of social-media content during the pandemic likely violated the First Amendment.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
A snail once proud with shell of gold,
Now by market's downturn, sold.
Apple, Nvidia, their worth reduced,
In a week's loss, the snail deduced.

In the meadow, a hare did chance,
Upon a scene of a skyward dance.
A jet engine failed and rained down dread,
On Colorado town, Pratt's oversight had led.

An old goat gazes at the hill,
Where once home prices showed no thrill,
Yet, rose in summer's hot embrace,
Ending a decline with grace.

feedItems.title: The S&P 500 fell 1.3% for the week, weighed down by losses in Apple and Nvidia. The Nasdaq and Dow lost 1.9% and 0.7% for the week, respectively.
feedItems.description: The S&P 500 fell 1.3% for the week, weighed down by losses in Apple and Nvidia. The Nasdaq and Dow lost 1.9% and 0.7% for the week, respectively.

feedItems.title: Inadequate inspections by Pratt & Whitney were partly responsible for a midflight breakdown of a jet engine that showered a Colorado town with metal 2½ years ago, aviation-safety authorities found.
feedItems.description: Inadequate inspections by Pratt & Whitney were partly responsible for a midflight breakdown of a jet engine that showered a Colorado town with metal 2½ years ago, aviation-safety authorities found.

feedItems.title: U.S. home prices rose in July after declining on a year-over-year basis for five consecutive months, the longest run of declines in 11 years.
feedItems.description: U.S. home prices rose in July after declining on a year-over-year basis for five consecutive months, the longest run of declines in 11 years.
